channel.title: Advice on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Advice on Simba Tango

item.title: Top 40
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by Ger Audrey I loved the think top 40 part of Alex’ rant after attending a festival. The dj should think hits, hits and more hits to please the dancers. And maybe throw in a little surprise. Not all the time, but we need a little variation. But in general, play the good stuff. People are not interested in you digging up some weird music that you think maybe will work for tango.
